mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(CONT_SEQ),0) FROM SERVICE_CONTRACT WHERE CUST_ID = #{custId} AND DEPT_ID LIKE #{deptId} AND CONT_SDATE <= LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#{yymm}||'01')) AND CONT_EDATE >= TO_DATE(#{yymm}||'01') AND ( CANCEL_DATE IS NULL OR CANCEL_DATE > TO_DATE(#{yymm}||'01') )
SELECT A.M_LIMIT_AMT, A.REQ_LIMIT_AMT FROM TABLE(FN_GS_GET_CARE_BASIC_AMT(#{level}, #{rate})) A

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CODE_CLOSING WHERE YYYYMM = #{yymm} AND DEPT_ID = #{deptId} AND ( ( #{col} = 'gongcloseyn' AND ( GONGCLOSEYN = 'Y' OR DEPT_GONGCLOSEYN = 'Y' ) ) OR ( #{col} = 'servicecloseyn' AND ( SERVICECLOSEYN = 'Y' OR DEPT_SERVICECLOSEYN = 'Y' ) ) OR ( #{col} = 'paycloseyn' AND ( PAYCLOSEYN = 'Y' OR DEPT_PAYCLOSEYN = 'Y' ) ) OR ( #{col} = 'acntcloseyn' AND ( ACNTCLOSEYN = 'Y' OR DEPT_ACNTCLOSEYN = 'Y' ) ) OR ( #{col} = 'sellcloseyn' AND ( SELLCLOSEYN = 'Y' OR DEPT_SELLCLOSEYN = 'Y' ) ) OR ( #{col} = 'specialcloseyn' AND ( SPECIALCLOSEYN = 'Y' OR DEPT_SPECIALCLOSEYN = 'Y' ) ) )
mapper.update: UPDATE CODE_CLOSING SET DEPT_GONGCLOSEYN = CASE WHEN #{col} = 'gongcloseyn' THEN 'Y' ELSE DEPT_GONGCLOSEYN END , DEPT_GONGCLOSEDATE = CASE WHEN #{col} = 'gongcloseyn' THEN SYSDATE ELSE DEPT_GONGCLOSEDATE END , DEPT_SERVICECLOSEYN = CASE WHEN #{col} = 'servicecloseyn' THEN 'Y' ELSE DEPT_SERVICECLOSEYN END , DEPT_SERVICECLOSEDATE = CASE WHEN #{col} = 'servicecloseyn' THEN SYSDATE ELSE DEPT_SERVICECLOSEDATE END , DEPT_PAYCLOSEYN = CASE WHEN #{col} = 'paycloseyn' THEN 'Y' ELSE DEPT_PAYCLOSEYN END , DEPT_PAYCLOSEDATE = CASE WHEN #{col} = 'paycloseyn' THEN SYSDATE ELSE DEPT_PAYCLOSEDATE END , DEPT_ACNTCLOSEYN = CASE WHEN #{col} = 'acntcloseyn' THEN 'Y' ELSE DEPT_ACNTCLOSEYN END , DEPT_ACNTCLOSEDATE = CASE WHEN #{col} = 'acntcloseyn' THEN SYSDATE ELSE DEPT_ACNTCLOSEDATE END , DEPT_SELLCLOSEYN = CASE WHEN #{col} = 'sellcloseyn' THEN 'Y' ELSE DEPT_SELLCLOSEYN END , DEPT_SELLCLOSEDATE = CASE WHEN #{col} = 'sellcloseyn' THEN SYSDATE ELSE DEPT_SELLCLOSEDATE END , DEPT_SPECIALCLOSEYN = CASE WHEN #{col} = 'specialcloseyn' THEN 'Y' ELSE DEPT_SPECIALCLOSEYN END , DEPT_SPECIALCLOSEDATE = CASE WHEN #{col} = 'specialcloseyn' THEN SYSDATE ELSE DEPT_SPECIALCLOSEDATE END WHERE YYYYMM = #{yymm} AND DEPT_ID = #{deptId}

SELECT PROOFFI_DIV FROM CODE_PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productCode}
SELECT APP_RATE_DIV FROM SERVICE_CONTRACT WHERE CUST_ID = #{custId} AND #{date} BETWEEN CONT_SDATE AND NVL(CANCEL_DATE, CONT_EDATE)
SELECT COMDIV_NAME FROM CODE_COMDIV WHERE COMSEC_CODE = '0111' AND COMDIV_CODE = #{comdivCode}
